name: Broccoli VS Burger
description:
(Enter full screen for best results!)

Who will win in the battle of Broccoli and Burger? Choose your fighter and take on your enemy. Broccoli VS Burger is a simple action/fight game. Select your fighter, press UP / DOWN arrows to move, press SPACE to shoot, avoid enemy attacks and hit the enemy 5 times to win.

Made in 4 hours for Trijam #125 game jam The theme was "One Enemy Only". This is my first time using Unity for a Trijam so it was pretty challenging; the game is very simple and a bit rough and I went over the 3 hour time limit, but I'm pretty happy with how it turned out and it was a good learning experience, as always! All code and art was made during the jam. The music and SFX were made before the jam for a different project.
